title: Riot, Why You Gotta Be So Rude

embed.description: The Riot Games merch store is here! Discover merch crafted to capture the spirit of League in every stitch and brushstroke, so you can carry a piece of your game wherever you go.

body: As  might of seen. Riot is having a thing called figure fest where you can get to figure for the price of $30 instead of the regular $50. Sounds great right . Although you can only pick a pair of the figures shown below to get the sale. All this is fine but what really grinds my gears is that they also released  7 new figures. only 3 of which are if the selected group that you can pair and get the sale on. These 3 are heimerdonger, lulu and braum. In my opinion these are eprobaly the least wanted ones by the community. Why release 7 amazing new figures and only make the 3 "worst" ones compatible with the sale. Riot Why You Gotta Be So Rude{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Wait, I'm getting the Heimerdinger and Lulu ones. I really like those ones. :/
The problem is that all the good ones like gnar will be out of stock the second the sale starts.
What time does the sale start?

Nah, they are all gonna be on sale, it says nothing about those specific figures to be the only ones to be on sale, as it says ANY single figure or ANY pair. Unless a riot member can tell us otherwise, there is no proof to tell me otherwise... 

If your right though, I'm going to be pissed, as I wanted to get gnar and heimerdinger in a pair...
